entry.title: Sparked: Part 1
entry.summary:
Author: HitopCub

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 226,307Chapters: 17/44Kudos: 29

Summary: After The Alignment - a cosmic therapy session led by his and Derek's future son from an alternate reality - Stiles Stilinski's latent spark abilities are awakened. Now he's diving into his first six months of magical training with a prestigious coven, hidden on the 13th floor of a Silicon Valley tech giant.Stiles navigates a world where cutting-edge tech meets ancient magic. He's juggling unpredictable spark powers, bonding with fellow apprentices, and trying not to spill interdimensional secrets (like being married to Derek in another reality). Meanwhile, he's nurturing dreams of opening an apothecary in Beacon Hills.But it's not all cinnamon rolls and spell books. A sinister presence is sabotaging Stiles' training, and rumors of a spy threaten to tear the coven apart. Stiles must unravel these mysteries while mastering his abilities and grappling with growing feelings for Derek.With help from old and new friends, Stiles faces challenges that will shape his future as a spark. "Sparked: Part 1" is a tale of magic, mayhem, and coming-of-age, proving that in six months, anything can happen - especially when you're a spark-in-training with a knack for trouble and a head full of secrets.

entry.title: Renaissance in ruins
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,174Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 47

Summary: Stiles returns to Beacon Hills after years of disappearance. He brings with him a child, but something is different. His presence is marked by a silent pain, a weight that the pack can't ignore.Derek quickly notices that Stiles is no longer the same. There‚Äôs something in his behavior, in his gaze, that hides a dark past. But what happened to him? What is he trying to hide?The pack, still hurt by Stiles' sudden departure, doesn‚Äôt know how to deal with his return. Stiles‚Äô secrets begin to surface, and with them, a truth no one expected.And, in the midst of it all, Derek starts to wonder: is what happened to Stiles something that can be healed? Or is he already lost forever?

entry.title: What He Lost
entry.summary:
Author: mooselocked

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,380Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 713

Summary: It's Stiles senior year, and the pack has kind of reached an understanding. They tolerate Derek because, hello, alpha. But nobody really likes him because, hello, asshole. But, apparently, that's not good enough.There's something that's been watching out for the Hales for years, and she decides she's had enough of the pack's treatment of Derek. Stiles needs to learn a lesson. Lucky him.Finding himself suddenly in a world where the Hale fire never happened, he is suddenly building relationships with all of these people he never knew existed, and getting to know a Derek he never knew was possible. But how will he get home? And, when the time comes, will he even want to?

entry.title: Waiting In The Wings
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,824Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 274

Summary: Melissa folded her arms and stared at Stiles, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm still having a hard time believing that Derek Hale, of all people, is your boyfriend now.‚Äù‚ÄúYep! Derek‚Äôs my boyfriend! We‚Äôre totally rocking the whole relationship thing. I mean, we‚Äôre no Scott and Allison when it comes to PDA, but we‚Äôre both very affectionate behind closed doors. It‚Äôs kind of hilarious actually, because some people think that Derek doesn‚Äôt even like me when we‚Äôre in public, just because he growls or glares at me from time to time. But we‚Äôre just a misunderstood couple, y‚Äôknow‚Ä¶ Kind of like other star-crossed lovers out there. We‚Äôre basically this generation‚Äôs Romeo and‚Ä¶ Miguel.‚ÄùMelissa was grinning so wide that her face almost hurt. Stiles had wildly overcompensated, and now she knew he was lying.‚ÄúIf you and Derek are boyfriends, you won‚Äôt have a problem inviting him over for dinner then.‚ÄùStiles malfunctioned for a full second before squawking like a dying bird, ‚ÄúDinner?!‚Äù

entry.title: A Cartography of Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: Waddiwasii

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,727Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 138

Summary: It‚Äôs a tentative, fragile thing, what they have together. Nothing more than the bare bones of something that might, in a different world, be worth defining.Which means they fuck a lot, but not much else.Stiles is okay with it, but he also knows himself pretty well by now, and enforcing a clear divide between sex and feelings has never been his vibe. Derek, though‚ÄîDerek is skittish. A bunny-rabbit-heart beating fast, fast, fast beneath the sharp teeth and claws of a wolf‚Äôs costume.Stiles sees it, even if Derek pretends otherwise.But also:‚ÄúCan you give us, like, two minutes, tops?" Stiles asks, a bit desperate. "Some of us didn‚Äôt get to orgasm, and I'm not naming any names here, but‚Äîyeah, okay, it‚Äôs me.‚ÄùHis dad exhales, tired and displeased, the kind of breath that usually comes right before he puts Stiles under strict house arrest."Hale," he says resolutely. "Get your goddamn ass off my kid."
